title: Ashley Benson Posts Gorgeous Underwear Selfie, Showing Off Her New Extensions
text:
From Seventeen

Less than a week after unveiling her new brunette 'do, Ashley Benson has added boob-length extensions to the mix.

Along with the hair reveal, Ashley also blessed us with an underwear pic that is, quite frankly, straight fire.

Ashley Benson is going through a time of transformation and personal growth â€“ in her hair. The Pretty Little Liars actress abandoned her signature blonde waves in favor of a new, chocolatey brunette 'do just five days ago. Less than a week later, she's changing up her look once again.

Yesterday, Ashley posed for an adorable mirror selfie, wearing nothing but a bra and underwear set from The Kit. But even the beautiful body of Ashley Benson couldn't distract from the foot of hair she acquired seemingly overnight.

Here's the before:

And this is the afer:

Even though she gave up the bleach blonde hue she's been rocking for the past like five years, the extra inches still stay true to her laid-back vibe. The extensions have a subtle ombre effect, fading to a lighter shade of caramel towards the ends.

Photo credit: Instagram More

Love that for her.

Follow Kelsey on Instagram!
